example_name_request:
Examples: 

• 10% off on price

• Discounted e-bike renting

• 1 hour of free parking
no_request:
There are no offers for this POS.
Create one by tapping on the + button.
wom_age_suggestion: Indicates the maximum age, in days, of accepted WOM.
wom_age_warning: By not using the filter we accept WOM of any age.
insert_value_grather: Insert values greater than 0 and lower than 1000
insert_service_price: The number of WOMs required to access the offer
aim_suggestion: Select the type of WOM required to access the offer.
aim_warning: If you do not specify any aim, you will accept WOMs of any kind.
no_connection_desc: To accumulate or consume WOMs your device needs to be connected to the internet
no_connection_aim_desc:
Since this is the first time launching the app you need an active internet connection to download all necessary data for configuring your POS. 
Turn your network data on and click "Retry"
no_connection_transaction_desc:
To generate a payment request your device needs to have an active internet connection. 
Turn your network data on and click "Retry"
no_pos_alert:
Attention you have no POS
Press the button below to create a POS
selection_pos_suggestion: Tap here to select the POS to manage
welcome_desc: With this instrument you can set discounts and concessions that you want to offer to whoever has done socially useful actions.
merchant_desc:
To generate offers on your behalf you must be registered as a Merchant.
If you haven't already, register now or proceed anonymously
wom_desc: Most individual actions generate social value. This value is quantified in terms of WOM, special vouchers included in the list of social and digital innovation instruments of the European Commission.
wom_suggestion_desc: Since every WOM is equivalent to one minute of commitment, you can freely decide how many WOM are needed to earn your offers.
no_merchants: You don't have any Merchant paired with your account. Log in via the web and add a Merchant
login_insufficient_pos: The login was successful, but there aren't Merchants or POSs registered for this account!
title: Title
do_you_want_create: Do you want to create a new offer?
titleOfferDesc: Pick an enticing title that expresses the content of your offer clearly.
descriptionOfferDesc: A detailed description helps users understanding the offer and its conditions. If there are limitations and restrictions, put them here.
womNumberDesc: Set the amount of WOMs needed to redeem the offer.
titleMinLengthWarning: The title needs to be at least 6 characters long.
noZeroWomWarning: You must require one WOM or more.
bounding_box_help: Define the size of your geographical bounding box by dragging the slider. You can move the center point of the bounding box by clicking on the map.
aimDesc: If set, you will accept only WOM vouchers generated with that specific aim.
bounding_box_desc: If set, you will accept only WOM vouchers generated within the specified geographical area.
wom_age_desc: If set, you will accept only more recent WOM vouchers, generated at most a set number of days in the past.
persistent_offer_desc: This offer can be user multiple times, by different users, and will always remain valid. The WOM Pocket app will show it to nearby users and you will be able to print and display the offer in your shop.
ephemeral_offer_desc: This offer can only be used once and it will be registered on this POS only. Use this option to create ‘disposable’ offers for single users.
minLengthWarn2: The minimum number of characters is
handlePosDesc: Edit the title, description, and cover image of your POS
name: Name
createYourMerchant: Create your Merchant on our website
backHereAndLogin: , then come back here and log in again
noMerchant: The login was successful, but you don’t have a Merchant linked to your account.
anonymousTypeOfferSelectorMessage: Note: anonymous users cannot create public offers.
